DataShape.description: A set of calculated statistics about a field in a dataset
DataShape.name: FieldDistributionStatistics

FieldDefinition.description: The coefficient of variation (aka: relative standard deviation) of all values in the field's distribution (standard deviation / mean)
FieldDefinition.name: coefficientOfVariation

FieldDefinition.description: The corrected sum of squares of the field's distribution (∑(value - mean)^2)
FieldDefinition.name: correctedSumOfSquares

FieldDefinition.description: Number of records in the dataset
FieldDefinition.name: count

FieldDefinition.description: The name of the analyzed field
FieldDefinition.name: fieldName

FieldDefinition.description: Kurtosis of the distribution. This is a measure of the "tailedness" or extremeness of outliers of the field's distribution. Gaussian (normal) distributions have a kurtosis of 3. Values below 3 have fewer outliers (example: uniform distribution). Values greater than 3 have larger tails, or more extreme outliers (example: laplace distribution)
FieldDefinition.name: kurtosis

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum observed value of the field's distribution
FieldDefinition.name: maximum

FieldDefinition.description: The average of the field's distribution
FieldDefinition.name: mean

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum observed value of the field's distribution
FieldDefinition.name: minimum

FieldDefinition.description: The difference between the maximum and minimum values
FieldDefinition.name: range

FieldDefinition.description: Skewness of the distribution. This is a measure of the asymmetry of the field's distribution, where 0 = perfectly balanced, < 0 = distribution tilts to the right, and > 0 = distribution tilts to the left
FieldDefinition.name: skewness

FieldDefinition.description: Measure of the amount of variation in the field's distribution
FieldDefinition.name: standardDeviation

FieldDefinition.description: The standard error of the mean for the field's distribution (standard deviation / √count). Not to be confused with mean error
FieldDefinition.name: standardErrorOfTheMean

FieldDefinition.description: The sum of all of the values
FieldDefinition.name: sumOfAllObservations

FieldDefinition.description: The uncorrected sum of squares of the field's distribution (∑(value)^2)
FieldDefinition.name: uncorrectedSumOfSquares

FieldDefinition.description: Measure of how far the field's distribution is spread from its mean
FieldDefinition.name: variance
